sn17.3:1.3: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, aññatarasmiṁ udakarahade mahākummakulaṁ ciranivāsi ahosi.
sn17.3:1.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, aññataro kummo aññataraṁ kummaṁ etadavoca:
sn17.3:1.5: ‘mā kho tvaṁ, tāta kumma, etaṁ padesaṁ agamāsī’ti.
sn17.3:1.6: Agamāsi kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṁ padesaṁ.
sn17.3:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so kummo yena so kummo tenupasaṅkami.
sn17.3:1.9: Addasā kho, bhikkhave, so kummo taṁ kummaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn17.3:1.11: ‘kacci tvaṁ, tāta kumma, na taṁ padesaṁ agamāsī’ti?
sn17.3:1.14: ‘Akkhato khomhi, tāta kumma, anupahato, atthi ca me idaṁ suttakaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhan’ti.
sn17.3:1.16: Etena hi te, tāta kumma, suttakena pitaro ca pitāmahā ca anayaṁ āpannā byasanaṁ āpannā.
sn17.3:1.17: Gaccha dāni tvaṁ, tāta kumma, na dāni tvaṁ amhākan’ti.
sn17.3:2.1: Luddoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṁ pāpimato adhivacanaṁ.
sn17.3:2.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhasakkārasilokaṁ assādeti nikāmeti—
sn17.3:2.5: ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papatāya anayaṁ āpanno byasanaṁ āpanno yathākāmakaraṇīyo pāpimato.
